query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Rat Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Wisdom and Prosperity - The Sacred Guardian of the Rat',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Rat symbolizes intelligence, resourcefulness, and the ability to seize opportunities. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Rat, as the first of the twelve zodiac animals, represents new beginnings and the courage to venture into the unknown. Those born in the Year of the Rat are blessed with sharp intuition and the wisdom to navigate life''s complexities with grace.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Rat (1948, 1960, 1972, 1984, 1996, 2008, 2020)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Rat''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510001;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Ox Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Strength and Perseverance - The Sacred Guardian of the Ox',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Ox symbolizes diligence, reliability, and steadfast determination. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
In Chinese cosmology, the Ox represents the earth element—grounded, stable, and nurturing. Those born under this sign possess an inner fortitude that allows them to weather any storm and emerge stronger.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Ox (1949, 1961, 1973, 1985, 1997, 2009, 2021)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Ox''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510002;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Tiger Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Courage and Power - The Sacred Guardian of the Tiger',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Tiger symbolizes raw courage, fierce protection, and indomitable spirit. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
As the king of beasts in Chinese tradition, the Tiger symbolizes authority, confidence, and the power to overcome adversity. Those born in the Year of the Tiger are natural leaders, blessed with charisma and the courage to face any challenge.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Tiger (1950, 1962, 1974, 1986, 1998, 2010, 2022)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Tiger''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510003;
